title: Not getting Verification Email for uLoL Registration
body:
When attempting to sign up for uLoL, a Verification Email is supposedly sent but is I never receive one. I've tried multiple times.
I've checked both my verified League-account Email and my College Email thoroughly (I've checked Gmail's "Social" and "Promotions" auto-generated Email tabs, and checked the spam section of both Emails).
Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We'll be able to get you to the right team to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Actually, I already did just that. But I thought It might be a good idea to post something here too, as the ticket hasn't gotten any attention for almost 4 days. It's Request #23469829
